subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In a Q. and A., Murray spoke about his role in tennis’s Big 4 and his familiarity with his U.S Open quarterfinals opponent, Novak Djokovic, whom he has played 20 times.
snippet: In a Q. and A., Murray spoke about his role in tennis’s Big 4 and his familiarity with his U.S Open quarterfinals opponent, Novak Djokovic, whom he has played 20 times.
